title: Family Health
shortDescription: Comprehensive care for every member of your family.
description: At BSH, our Family Health service is dedicated to providing comprehensive, patient-centered care for individuals and families across all ages and stages of life. We believe in building long-term relationships with our patients, allowing us to understand your unique health needs and provide personalized care that supports your overall well-being.

features.title: Preventive Care
features.description: Regular check-ups, vaccinations, and health screenings.

features.title: Chronic Disease Management
features.description: Ongoing care for conditions like diabetes, hypertension and asthma.

features.title: Pediatric Care
features.description: Specialized healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents.

features.title: Women's Health
features.description: Including gynecological exams, prenatal care, and menopause management.

title: Surgeries
shortDescription: Advanced surgical procedures with state-of-the-art technology and expert surgeons.
description: Our surgery department is equipped with cutting-edge technology and staffed by highly skilled surgeons. We offer a wide range of surgical procedures, from minimally invasive to complex operations, all performed with the highest standards of safety and care.

features.title: General Surgery
features.description: Common procedures including appendectomy, hernia repair, and gallbladder removal.

features.title: Minimally Invasive Surgery
features.description: Laparoscopic procedures for faster recovery and minimal scarring.

features.title: Emergency Surgery
features.description: 24/7 emergency surgical services for acute conditions.

features.title: Post-operative Care
features.description: Comprehensive recovery support and rehabilitation services.

title: Gynaecology
shortDescription: Specialized care for reproductive health, including menopause and hormone health.
description: Our gynecology department provides comprehensive care for women's reproductive health. From routine check-ups to complex procedures, our experienced team offers compassionate care in a comfortable and private setting.

features.title: Routine Check-ups
features.description: Regular gynecological examinations and health screenings.

features.title: Pregnancy Care
features.description: Comprehensive prenatal and postnatal care services.

features.title: Fertility Services
features.description: Diagnosis and treatment of fertility issues.

features.title: Menopause Management
features.description: Support and treatment for menopause-related symptoms.

title: Haematology
shortDescription: Diagnosis and treatment of blood disorders and related conditions.
description: Our hematology department specializes in diagnosing and treating disorders of the blood, bone marrow, and lymphatic systems. We offer comprehensive care for both benign and malignant blood conditions.

features.title: Blood Disorders
features.description: Diagnosis and treatment of anemia, blood clotting disorders, and other conditions.

features.title: Cancer Care
features.description: Treatment for leukemia, lymphoma, and other blood cancers.

features.title: Blood Testing
features.description: Advanced diagnostic testing and monitoring services.

features.title: Transfusion Services
features.description: Safe and efficient blood transfusion services.

features.title: Rapid Response

features.title: Expert Team
